languages.text: "Как ты там говорил? "Угрозы — удел слабых"? Благодарю за демонстрацию".
"What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
languages.original_text: "Как ты там говорил? "Угрозы — удел слабых"? Благодарю за демонстрацию".

traits.locale_text: "What was that you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
"What was that you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
"What was that you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
"What was that you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
"What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
"What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."

languages.text: “你之前是怎么说的来着？‘威胁是弱者的手段’？谢谢你用实际行动解释了这句话。”
languages.original_text: "What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."

traits.locale_text: “你之前是怎么说的来着？‘威胁是弱者的手段’？谢谢你用实际行动解释了这句话。”

languages.text: 「以前言っていたこと覚えているか？『脅しは弱者の手段』だったな？大事な事を思い出させてくれたこと、感謝するよ」
languages.original_text: "What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."

traits.locale_text: 「以前言っていたこと覚えているか？『脅しは弱者の手段』だったな？大事な事を思い出させてくれたこと、感謝するよ」

languages.text: «¿Qué fue lo que dijo? "¿Las amenazas son el recurso de los débiles?". Gracias por el ejemplo».
languages.original_text: "What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué fue lo que dijo? "¿Las amenazas son el recurso de los débiles?". Gracias por el ejemplo».

languages.text: "Was habt Ihr einmal gesagt? 'Drohungen sind das Mittel der Schwachen'? Danke für die Demonstration."
languages.original_text: "What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."

traits.locale_text: "Was habt Ihr einmal gesagt? 'Drohungen sind das Mittel der Schwachen'? Danke für die Demonstration."

languages.text: « N'est-ce pas vous qui m'avez dit que seuls les faibles ont recours aux menaces ? Il ne fallait pas vous sentir obligé de me le prouver. »
languages.original_text: "What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."

traits.locale_text: « N'est-ce pas vous qui m'avez dit que seuls les faibles ont recours aux menaces ? Il ne fallait pas vous sentir obligé de me le prouver. »

languages.text: "Senin bir sözün vardı ya, neydi? 'Tehdit, zayıfların yöntemidir.' Sözünü kanıtladığın için teşekkürler."
languages.original_text: "What was it you said once? 'Threats are the recourse of the weak'? Thank you for illustrating the point."
